name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
description: Join the Resistance in an epic battle against the First Order in this immersive, multi-stage experience featuring trackless vehicles and life-size AT-ATs.

tips.content: Most popular attraction in the park. Purchase Individual Lightning Lane or arrive at rope drop.
Multi-stage experience includes walking, so allow extra time for the full experience.

name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
description: Take the controls of the famous Millennium Falcon on a customized smuggling mission where your actions determine the outcome.

tips.content: Pilot positions provide the most interactive experience, but all roles are fun and important.
Your performance affects the ship's condition - work as a team!

name: The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror
description: Step into a haunted hotel elevator for a spine-tingling 13-story drop experience through the Twilight Zone.

tips.content: Multiple drop sequences make each ride unique. The elevator actually pulls you down faster than gravity!
On-ride photo taken during the drop sequence - keep your eyes open!

name: Rock 'n' Roller Coaster Starring Aerosmith
description: Launch from 0 to 60 mph in 2.8 seconds on this indoor roller coaster featuring Aerosmith's greatest hits in the dark.

tips.content: Will be re-themed to The Muppets in 2026. Experience the Aerosmith version while you can!
Synchronized soundtrack makes each seat have a slightly different musical experience.

name: Mickey & Minnie's Runaway Railway
description: Join Mickey and Minnie on a zany adventure through a cartoon world in Disney's first Mickey Mouse ride-through attraction.

tips.content: First Mickey Mouse-themed ride ever! Perfect for all ages and very popular with families.
Trackless technology means each ride can be slightly different - multiple rides recommended!

name: Slinky Dog Dash
description: Andy has built a roller coaster in his backyard using his Slinky Dog toy. Enjoy gentle thrills with great views of Toy Story Land.

tips.content: Very popular family coaster. Use Lightning Lane or rope drop strategy for shorter waits.
Great views of the entire Toy Story Land from the coaster's high points.

name: Star Tours – The Adventures Continue
description: Experience a 3D space adventure with multiple storylines and destinations across the Star Wars galaxy.

tips.content: Over 70 possible combinations of scenes! Multiple rides for different experiences.
3D glasses required - those with vision issues should inform Cast Members.

name: Toy Story Mania!
description: Pull the string on a virtual cannon and compete in 4D carnival games alongside your favorite Toy Story characters.

tips.content: Competitive shooting gallery - practice your aim and try to beat your family's scores!
4D effects include scents and air bursts that enhance the carnival game experience.

name: Alien Swirling Saucers
description: The aliens have powered up their flying saucers for a spinning adventure set to energetic space music.

tips.content: Similar to Mad Tea Party but with Toy Story theming. Control your spin level with the wheel.
Outdoor ride - can close due to weather. Plan accordingly.

name: Fantasmic!
description: Mickey Mouse's imagination comes to life in this spectacular nighttime show featuring fireworks, water effects, and live performers.

tips.content: Arrive 45-60 minutes early for the best seats. Bring cushions for comfort on hard benches.
Features a 50+ live performers and 40-foot dragon finale - truly spectacular!

name: Beauty and the Beast - Live on Stage
description: Experience the Broadway-style retelling of the beloved Disney classic with elaborate costumes and musical numbers.

tips.content: 5 shows daily - check My Disney Experience app for current showtimes.
Great air-conditioned break during hot Florida days. Perfect for all ages.

name: Indiana Jones Epic Stunt Spectacular!
description: Witness incredible stunts and special effects that reveal the secrets behind the Indiana Jones action sequences.

tips.content: Arrive early if you want to be selected as an audience extra for the show!
Educational behind-the-scenes look at movie magic and stunt work.

name: For the First Time in Forever: A Frozen Sing-Along Celebration
description: Join Anna, Elsa, and the Arendelle historians for a fun-filled sing-along celebration of Frozen songs.

tips.content: Audience participation encouraged! Don't be shy about singing along.
Great for Frozen fans of all ages. Air-conditioned theater is perfect for midday break.

name: The Little Mermaid – A Musical Adventure
description: Dive under the sea with Ariel in this enhanced musical featuring puppetry, live performances, and digital effects.

tips.content: New show debuted May 27, 2025! Features enhanced visuals and new puppets.
Continuous shows from 9:15 AM to 7:15 PM - easy to catch between other attractions.

name: Disney Villains: Unfairly Ever After
description: The Disney Villains take center stage in this entertaining show featuring Maleficent, Cruella de Vil, and Captain Hook.

tips.content: New show debuted May 27, 2025! Features digital projections and live villain performances.
Perfect for Disney villain fans. Short and sweet entertainment.

name: Walt Disney Presents
description: Explore Walt Disney's life and legacy through exhibits and the inspiring film 'Walt Disney: One Man's Dream.'

tips.content: Don't miss meeting Sulley from Monsters, Inc. inside the exhibit!
Great way to learn about Disney history and cool off during hot days.

name: Mickey Shorts Theater
description: Enjoy a classic Mickey Mouse cartoon short in this intimate theater setting.

tips.content: Currently showing 'Vacation Fun' - perfect quick entertainment between attractions.
Great for Mickey Mouse fans and a nice air-conditioned break.

name: Mickey and Minnie Mouse at Red Carpet Dreams
description: Meet the famous mouse duo in their Hollywood finest at this glamorous character greeting location.

tips.content: Classic character meet with Mickey and Minnie in their Hollywood outfits. Great for photos!
Usually shorter waits compared to other character meets in the park.

name: The Hollywood Brown Derby
description: Signature dining restaurant recreating the famous 1940s Hollywood hotspot, known for the original Cobb salad and elegant atmosphere.

tips.content: Famous for the original Cobb salad and grapefruit cake. Classic Hollywood glamour atmosphere.
Caricatures of Hollywood stars line the walls. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Sci-Fi Dine-In Theater Restaurant
description: Unique dining experience in car-shaped booths watching classic sci-fi movie clips in a drive-in theater setting.

tips.content: Themed like a 1950s drive-in theater with car booths. Classic B-movie clips play continuously.
Popular for the unique atmosphere - food is decent but theming is the main attraction.

name: 50's Prime Time Café
description: Step into Mom's kitchen circa 1950s where servers act like family members and scold you for not eating your vegetables.

tips.content: Servers stay in character as 1950s family members. They may scold you - it's all part of the fun!
Classic comfort food menu. Great for families who enjoy interactive dining experiences.

name: Mama Melrose's Ristorante Italiano
description: Family-owned Italian restaurant serving wood-fired pizzas, pasta, and Italian specialties in a cozy trattoria setting.

tips.content: Wood-fired pizzas and Italian classics. Often easier to get reservations than other table service options.
Fantasmic! dinner package available for preferred show seating.

name: Hollywood & Vine
description: Art Deco-styled buffet restaurant featuring character dining with Disney Junior characters during breakfast and lunch.

tips.content: Disney Junior character dining during breakfast and lunch. Seasonal character dining at dinner.
Buffet-style service with variety of options. Great for families with young children.

name: Oga's Cantina
description: Immersive Star Wars bar experience with specialty cocktails, music by DJ R-3X, and authentic cantina atmosphere from Galaxy's Edge.

tips.content: Most popular bar at Disney World. Reservations essential and limited to 45 minutes.
Specialty cocktails and unique atmosphere. DJ R-3X provides entertainment.

name: Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo
description: Star Wars-themed quick service restaurant in Galaxy's Edge serving galactic cuisine with unique out-of-this-world flavors.

tips.content: Immersive Star Wars theming with galactic food names. Try the Fried Endorian Tip-Yip!
Mobile order recommended during peak times. Great for Star Wars fans.
